Posts.Content: Feb 22, 2019 02:39PM - edited Feb 22, 2019 02:39PM by Birchbark26 I LOVE reading these inspirational posts My 32 year old daughter has stage IV breast cancer de novo. She is doing very well on Herceptin and Perjeta after one round of Taxol I wish you all continued health! Thank you for making me feel better ton

Posts.Content: Birchbark26 wrote: would like your thoughts on having a kitten that playfully scratches and bites while on chem Dx 7/16/2018, IDC, Right, Stage IV, metastasized to bone/liver/other, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Targeted Therapy Perjeta (pertuzumab) Targeted Therapy Herceptin (trastuzumab) Chemotherapy AC + T (Taxol) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Immune System and Cat Scratches Birchbark26 blainejennifer

Posts.Content: Birchbark26 wrote: my daughter has stage IV breast cancer with metastasis to chest wall, liver, cervical spine, and lymph nodes under arm Her latest scans show that the lymph nodes under her arm lit up active but have not grown since last scan The doctors say she can opt to go back on chemo since right now she is on immunotherapy only (perjeta and herceptin) but if she does this now it takes the Taxol off the table for the next progression and since Taxol worked so well for her with minimal side affects they would like to save the option. We are worried of the cancer spreading further and would like your thoughts Thank you Dx 7/16/2018, IDC, Right, Stage IV, metastasized to bone/liver/other, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Targeted Therapy Perjeta (pertuzumab) Targeted Therapy Herceptin (trastuzumab) Chemotherapy AC + T (Taxol) Log in to post a reply
